titles.title: ReConnecting Rural America Act of 2025
ReConnecting Rural America Act of 2025
To amend the Rural Electrification Act of 1936 to establish the ReConnect program under that Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, and Appropriations, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
